    FOKUS questionnaire schema

fokus: Provides an API around the FOKUS Post-voting Surveys

Source: R/fokus-package.R
fokus-package.Rd

fokus allows to (pre-)process and clean the raw data, analyze and visualize the cleaned data, create the questionnaires and provides other utility functions around the FOKUS post-voting surveys by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA) at the University of Zurich, Switzerland.

Package configuration

Some of fokus's functionality is controlled via package-specific global configuration which can either be set via R options or environment variables (the former take precedence). This configuration includes:

DescriptionR optionEnvironment variableDefault value
FOKUS-covered ballot date to fall back to in various functions of this package when it isn't explicitly specified. Basically a means to globally define the ballot date to be processed. One of "2018-09-23", "2018-11-25", "2019-10-20", "2020-09-27", "2020-10-18", "2021-11-28" or "2023-06-18".fokus.ballot_dateR_FOKUS_BALLOT_DATE2018-09-23
FOKUS-covered canton name to fall back to in various functions of this package when it isn't explicitly specified. Basically a means to globally define the canton to be processed. One of "aargau".fokus.cantonR_FOKUS_CANTON"aargau"
Maximal timespan to preserve the package's pkgpins cache. Cache entries older than this will be deleted upon package loading.fokus.global_max_cache_ageR_FOKUS_GLOBAL_MAX_CACHE_AGE"1 day"
Personal access token of a gitlab.com account with access to the private FOKUS repository.fokus.token_repo_privateR_FOKUS_TOKEN_REPO_PRIVATESys.getenv("GITLAB_COM_TOKEN")
